com.symbol.emdk.barcode

Class ScannerConfig.DecoderParams.Signature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.symbol.emdk.barcode.ScannerConfig.DecoderParams.BaseDecoder
      • com.symbol.emdk.barcode.ScannerConfig.DecoderParams.Signature
  • Enclosing class:
    ScannerConfig.DecoderParams

    public class ScannerConfig.DecoderParams.Signature
extends ScannerConfig.DecoderParams.BaseDecoder
    The Signature class provides access to parameters that are available for the Signature decoder.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ScannerConfig.SignatureImageBitsPerPixel bpp

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • width

        public int width
        Use to set width of the image. The aspect ratio of Width to Height must match the aspect ratio of the signature capture barcode to avoid distortion in captured image. 

         
 Example Usage:
 signature.width = 16;

      • height

        public int height
        Use to set height of the image. The aspect ratio of Width to Height must match the aspect ratio of the signature capture barcode to avoid distortion in captured image. 

         
 Example Usage:
 signature.height = 16;

      • format

        public ScannerConfig.SignatureImageFormat format
        Use to set format of the image. 

         
 Example Usage:
 signature.format = SignatureImageFormat.JPEG;

      • jpegQuality

        public int jpegQuality
        Use to set jpeg quality of the image. A value between 5 and 100 with a step of 5. 100 is the highest quality image and 5 means optimize for image size. 

         
 Example Usage:
 signature.jpegQuality = 5;

      • bpp

        public ScannerConfig.SignatureImageBitsPerPixel bpp
        Use to set bits per pixel for a black and white image. This parameter is not applicable to JPEG format. 

         
 Example Usage:
 signature.bpp = SignatureImageBitsPerPixel.BPP_1;
